text: By the Book may refer to: * By the Book (novel), a 2002 Star Trek: Enterprise novel * "By the Book" (song), a 1999 song by Michael Peterson * "By the Book", a first season television episode of 8 Simple Rules * "By the Book", a controversial mission in the video game Grand Theft Auto V * By the Book (film), a 2013 film by Milan J. Glavies * By the Book (TV series), an upcoming American sitcom
title: By the Book
